introText: Explore the beauty of Oman with us, from full day trips to adventures we will make sure your experience is a delight not to be forgotten.

service.title: Tailored Experience
service.desc: Contact us to create your own custom experience!

whyUsDesc1: The fun in a trip is multiplied when you are surrounded by amazing people
whyUsDesc2: We take you on memorable experiences catered for you
whyUsDesc3: Our guides are certified and are trained to always put your safety first
reviewDesc: Out of the blue, We discovered Omanosaura but at the end, Its human quality and good service made the difference. If you are looking to feel Oman's culture, live adventures and a good value for money, congrats, you are at home
